snippet: The second session of Congress will likely include a lawsuit over recent appointments by President Obama, as well as Senate Republicans turning minor procedures into major headaches.
abstract: Second session of the 112th Congress will likely include a lawsuit over the legality of appointments by President Obama, as well as more gridlock.
lead_paragraph: The second session of Congress will likely include a lawsuit over recent appointments by President Obama, as well as Senate Republicans turning minor procedures into major headaches.

headline.seo: Recent Fights in Congress Could Be Just Warm-Ups
headline.main: Recent Fights in Congress Could Be Just Warm-Ups
headline.print_headline: Recent Fights in Congress Could Be Just Warm-Ups
